intro: Stellarioides otavensis, commonly known as the Otavense starwort, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of Namibia. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae and is characterized by its small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of white and pink. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to withstand drought conditions. Its leaves are usually opposite and covered in fine hairs, which help reduce water loss. Stellarioides otavensis plays a role in stabilizing soil in its native habitat and provides nectar for local pollinators.
